name: AuthorsBorn
0:
”Alexa open Authors Born”
”Alexa play Authors Born”
”Alexa tell Authors Born to start game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: authors born
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In Authors Born, you are asked to name an author born in each of nine decades, from before 1920 through the 1990's. You score based on correct answers, with points deducted for wrong answers. If you don't have an answer, say 'next one' to go to the next decade. Say 'Start Game' to begin, or say 'Help' for more help.

To study up, look at the entry 'List of American Novelists' https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_American_novelists or the entry 'List of English Novelists' https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_English_novelists on Wikipedia.

Authors Born was implemented using Alexa Entities.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
